## Description
Analyze the current web application UI/UX (`app/`) and suggest improvements for the admin panels, taking inspiration from Dokploy.

## Goals
- Review current project structure and components.
- Identify areas for improvement in navigation, dashboard, and resource management.
- Propose a plan to enhance the UI/UX.

## Reference
- Dokploy: https://github.com/dokploy/dokploy
